DellTask.description: This version was added to add new Oem extension.
DellTask.longDescription: This version was added to add new Oem extension.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

CompletionTime.description: This property represents completion time of Job.
CompletionTime.longDescription: The value of this property represents when the job was completed.

EndTime.description: This property represents End time of Job.
EndTime.longDescription: This is the timestamp until when the service will wait for a job to complete. If a job did not complete within this time, it will be killed and marked as failed. TIME_NA is a default value that implies EndTime is not applicable. It is optional for clients to specify this property when creating a job.

JobState.longDescription: The value of the property specifies the State of the Job.

JobType.description: This property represent configuration type of job.
JobType.longDescription: The value of this property will be one of the possible configuration type of job.

Message.description: The status Message for the Job.
Message.longDescription: The value of this property shall indicate the status message for the Job.

MessageArgs.description: This array of message arguments are substituted for the arguments in the message.
MessageArgs.longDescription: This property shall contain the message substitution arguments for the specific message referenced by the MessageId and shall only be included if the MessageId is present.

MessageId.description: The Message Id of the Job.
MessageId.longDescription: The value of this property the Message Id of the Job.

PercentComplete.description: The percentage completion of the Job.
PercentComplete.longDescription: The value of this property shall indicate the percentage completion of the Job.

StartTime.description: This property represents scheduled start time of Job.
StartTime.longDescription: This property will be defined as a String that will contain a timestamp in Edm.DateTime format. TIME_NOW is a default value that implies apply pending configuration now. This property will be required when creating a job with future timestamp.

enumDescriptions.Completed: A job is in completed state
enumDescriptions.CompletedWithErrors: A job is in completed state with errors
enumDescriptions.Downloaded: A job is in downloaded state
enumDescriptions.Downloading: A job is in downloading state
enumDescriptions.Failed: A job is in failed state
enumDescriptions.New: A job is in newly created state
enumDescriptions.Paused: A job is in paused state
enumDescriptions.PendingActivation: A job is in pending activation state
enumDescriptions.ReadyForExecution: A job is in ready for execution state
enumDescriptions.RebootCompleted: A job is in reboot completed state
enumDescriptions.RebootFailed: A job is in reboot failed state
enumDescriptions.RebootPending: A job is in pending state for reboot
enumDescriptions.Running: A job is in running state
enumDescriptions.Scheduled: A job is in scheduled state
enumDescriptions.Scheduling: A job is in scheduling state
enumDescriptions.Unknown: A job is in unknown state
enumDescriptions.UserIntervention: Job is waiting for user intervention.
enumDescriptions.Waiting: A job is in waiting state

enumDescriptions.AutoDiscoveryGenerateClientCertPrivateKe: Job for generating Auto Discovery Client Cert Private Key
enumDescriptions.AutoDiscoveryReplacePublicKey: Job for Replacing Auto Discovery Public Key
enumDescriptions.DownloadServerPublicKey: Job for downloading Server Public Key
enumDescriptions.ExportConfiguration: A server configuration profile export job
enumDescriptions.ExportDeviceLog: Export NVMe Device logs status job
enumDescriptions.ImportConfiguration: A server configuration profile import job
enumDescriptions.LCConfig: A lifecycle controller attribute configuration job
enumDescriptions.LCLogExport: A lifecycle controller log export job
enumDescriptions.RealTimeNoRebootConfiguration: A real time configuration job without reboot
enumDescriptions.RebootForce: A reboot job with forced shutdown
enumDescriptions.RebootNoForce: A graceful reboot job without forced shutdown
enumDescriptions.RemoteDiagnostics: A diagnostics collection job from iDRAC
enumDescriptions.RepositoryUpdate: An update job from a repository
enumDescriptions.SACollectExportHealthData: Support Assist collect and export health data job
enumDescriptions.SACollectHealthData: Support Assist collect health data job
enumDescriptions.SAExportHealthData: Support Assist export health data job
enumDescriptions.SAExposeISM: Support Assist expose iSM installer package to host job
enumDescriptions.SARegistration: Support Assist register iDRAC to Dell backend server job
enumDescriptions.SEKMRekey: A Secure Enterprise Key Manager rekey job
enumDescriptions.SEKMStatusSet: A Secure Enterprise Key Manager status set job
enumDescriptions.UploadCustomDefaults: Upload Custom Default iDRAC settings using Server Configuration Profile job
enumDescriptions.vFlashCreatePartitionUsingImage: Create vFlash partition using Image job
enumDescriptions.vFlashExportDataFromPartition: Export vFlash data from Partition job
